text: Commander, you've arrived. The intel was solid, the readings show that the God Cube fragment is beyond that train station. Secure it quickly.
Hah, do you remember who you're talking to? Consider it done!
Commander then departs the train, arriving at the station.
The station is emptier than usual, too quiet. Any resistance expected?
Unlikely within the station itself. But we're detecting... anomalies. Other signatures. We've authorized you to assemble a small team from the operatives available on-site.
Understood. I'll gear up and choose my squad.
